1525610.name: Elmarion: the Lost Temple Demo
1525610.description:
Description

Elmarion: the Lost Temple is a first-person party RPG like games “Might and Magic”, “Wizardry”, “Legend of Grimrock”. The player controls a squad of 4 brave adventurers, choosing from 8 different classes: knight, archer, cleric, necromancer, fire mage, ice mage, air mage, nature mage. During the game, the squad explores the dungeons, clears them of monsters, and solves puzzles. Purpose of the game: to get an ancient powerful artifact.

History

The king was told about an ancient powerful artifact hidden in an abandoned temple, and he sent a squad of brave adventurers after it, promising them a generous reward.

Game features

1. Party first person RPG in real time.
2. 8 character classes: knight, archer, cleric, necromancer, fire mage, ice mage, air mage and nature mage.
3. Each character has 10 unique skills.
4. Pumping skills and parameters of characters with the receipt of levels.
5. Items and Equipment: dungeons contain many great magic weapons and armor.
6. Gameplay: interesting battles and puzzles.
7. Various three-dimensional locations, monsters and bosses.
